channel.title: Joshua K. Min
channel.description: Recent content on Joshua K. Min

item.title: Top 10 Best Spots to Study at UIUC
item.description: As a student who studies everyday and enjoys a variety of different types of study environments, I believe that I have one of the best top 10s list. I have been to over 30 different locations in the Champaign-Urbana area to study and I will be giving you my favorites. In this list, I will be giving you the description and vibe of each study environment. I will also give each of them a how-loud-you-can-be scale from 1-10.

item.title: EDA on Amazon Books
item.description: Data The data I have loaded in is called Amazon’s Top 50 Selling Books from 2009-2019. Here is a look at the data. ## Rows: 550 ## Columns: 7 ## $ Name <chr> "10-Day Green Smoothie Cleanse", "11/22/63: A Novel", "1… ## $ Author <chr> "JJ Smith", "Stephen King", "Jordan B. Peterson", "Georg… ## $ `User Rating` <dbl> 4.7, 4.6, 4.7, 4.7, 4.8, 4.4, 4.7, 4.7, 4.7, 4.6, 4.

item.title: Email Classification
item.description: In this project, I am going to be differentiating between spam emails and real ones using machine learning. The dataset is here: Link Here

item.title: Fetus Health Classification
item.description: Fetus Health Dataset This dataset contained a variety of features on newborns and it had its classification of 1-Normal, 2-Suspect, 3-Pathological. Description I used many different models with scikit-learn to predict the outcome of the health of a fetus and ended up using a random forest. I got a result of a 94% accurate model using GridSearchCV to get the best parameters. The only problem is that the grid search take a while, so play around with it.

item.title: Image Processing
item.description: Projects using Image Processing Coming soon!

item.title: League of Legends
item.description: Description League of Legends is a team-based strategy game where two teams that consist of five champions fight each other to destroy each other’s base while defending their own. There are many ways to get an advantage on your opponent and with all of this data collected on games, I was able to achieve a 73 percent success rate of predicting the game’s outcomes correctly using logistic regression. Click here for the Data

item.title: Life Expectancy
item.description: Description I used the dataset below to predict the life expectancy of different countries. Using linear regression, I have found out that it is very important for countries to be abundant in income composition of resources and have a good school system. This means that if more people share the wealth, the overall life expectancy should go up in theory. Click here for the Data Click here for the Source Code

item.title: Pygame
item.description: Description Pygame is a module in python that is designed for creating 2D videogames. With pygame, I was able to create a game where a doctor visits different rooms and is able to see differnt visualizations of data in each room. Here is the data: Link Here
